Login now to see activity from projects: Login now to see activity from projects you funded or follow
Connect to launch: Connect to launch your idea and to appear as a contributor when you fund an initiative.
Connecting with Twitter or Lightning all: Connecting with Twitter or Lightning allows you to keep track of your favorite projects and to launch your own projects.
If you're having trouble connecting with: If you're having trouble connecting with Twitter on Mobile, first try logging in on Twitter.com on your browser, then try again.
Please log back in with your profile, or: Please log back in with your profile, or press continue if you want to stay anonymous.
The last time someone tried to send fund: The last time someone tried to send funds to this wallet, there was a liquidity issue.
The last time someone tried to make a tr: The last time someone tried to make a transaction to this project, the invoice generation failed.
This project is live and wallet running: This project is live and wallet running smoothly.
This project has not been launched yet a: This project has not been launched yet and is only visible to the project creator.
This project has been deactivated by the: This project has been deactivated by the project creator.
Lightning addresses and QR codes make it: Lightning addresses and QR codes make it possible for anyone to fund projects from anywhere. Share one of the image and let the sats flow!
Your project is not live yet. Head back: Your project is not live yet. Head back to the creation flow to finalize your project information and launch it!
There are no any entries available: There are no any entries available
You cannot publish an entry in an inacti: You cannot publish an entry in an inactive project. Finish the project configuration or re-activate the project to publish this entry.
Are you sure you want to remove the entr: Are you sure you want to remove the entry

Please update the amount, or contact us: Please update the amount, or contact us for donating a higher amount.
Email is a required field when donating: Email is a required field when donating for a reward.
You are about to logout of your account: You are about to logout of your account
Geyser is not a store. It’s a way to bri: Geyser is not a store. It’s a way to bring creative projects to life using Bitcoin. Your donation will support a creative project that has yet to be developed. There’s a risk that, despite a creator’s best efforts, your reward will not be fulfilled, and we urge you to consider this risk prior to backing it. Geyser is not responsible for project claims or reward fulfillment.
Fund with any on-chain or lightning wall: Fund with any on-chain or lightning wallet.
If you are paying on-chain, make sure to: If you are paying on-chain, make sure to send the exact amount, otherwise it will not be displayed. The transaction will be confirmed after 1 confirmation.
Generating an invoice is taking longer t: Generating an invoice is taking longer than expected
Geyser charges a 2% operational fee from: Geyser charges a 2% operational fee from projects using lightning addresses, and no fees from projects that run their own nodes.
Now that your project is live you can ad: Now that your project is live you can add <1>Rewards</1> and <1>Milestones</1> and write <1>Entries</1>
In the <1>Dashboard</1> you’ll be able t: In the <1>Dashboard</1> you’ll be able to view the list of contributors and see some analytics.
You can always amend your project detail: You can always amend your project details by clicking <1>Edit Project</1>.
Your project data has been saved, except: Your project data has been saved, except for your wallet information (lightning address or node). Come back to the creation flow in order to add your wallet information or edit your project.
